column3: School of Policy and Global Affairs
column5: Key informationLearn how to apply economic and quantitative analysis to policy and decision-making in developed and developing countries around the world. You will build an understanding of economic development issues while learning economic theory and statistical tools required to analyse policies.Course overviewAre you looking to develop a rewarding career as a development economist in the public or private sector? This course will appeal to you if you have a quantitative background.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
